original_text:
SOLICITING FOR A BUSINESS VENTURE AND PARTNESHIP.

DEAR SIR,

I AM THE SON OF THE LATE PRESIDENT OF THE FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF ZAIRE, PRESIDENT MOBUTU SESE SEKO,(NOW REPUBLIC OF CONGO UNDER THE LEADERSHIP OF THE SON OF MR. LAURENT KABILA) I PRESUME YOU ARE AWARE THERE IS A FINANCIAL DISPUTE BETWEEN MY FAMILY (THE MOBUTUS) AND THE PRESENT CIVILIAN GOVERNMENT. THIS IS BASED ON WHAT THEY BELIEVE AS BAD AND CORRUPTS GOVERNANCE ON MY LATE FATHERS PART.  MAY HIS SOUL REST IN PEACE.

PRESENTLY, WE CANNOT DO BUSINESS HERE IN HOLLAND AND MANY OTHER COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD BECAUSE OF THE NEW FRIENDLY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PRESENT GOVERNMENT AND THE WESTERN WORLD AS YOU MIGHT HAVE HEARD HOW A LOT OF MY FATHERS BANK ACCOUNT IN SWITZERLAND NORTH AMERICAN HAVE SINCE BEEN FROZEN.

FOLLOWING THE ABOVE MENTION REASONS, I AM SOLICITING FOR YOUR HUMBLE AND CONFIDENTIAL ASSISTANCE TO TAKE CUSTODY OF TEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS (US$10.5) AND (5KG OF DIAMOND) ALSO TO FRONT FOR ME IN THE AREAS OF BUSINESS YOU DESIRE PROFITABLE. THIS SUM OF US$10.5M AND DIAMOND HAS SECRETLY BEEN DEPOSITED INTO A CONFIDENTIAL SECURITY COMPANY, WHERE IT CAN EASILY BEEN WITHDRAWN OR PAID TO A RECOMMENDED BENEFICIARY.

THIS FUNDS WILL BE RELEASED TO YOU BY THE SECURITY COMPANY BASED ON MY RECOMMENDATIONS ON THAT NOTE, YOU WILL BE PRESENTED AS MY PARTNER WHO WILL BE FRONTING FOR ME AND MY FAMILY IN ANY SUBSEQUENT VENTURES.

TO SHOW MY PREPAREDNESS AND THE APPRECIATION TO CONDUCT THIS BUSINESS WITH YOU I SHALL GIVE YOU 20% OF THE FUNDS AND 20% COMMISSION ON ANY PROFIT REALIZABLE IN THE PROCESS OF INVESTMENT OF THIS FUNDS FOR YOUR ROLE IN THIS BUSINESS,WE ARE WILLING TO MAKE AVAILABLE 5% FOR ANY EVENTUAL EXPENSE THAT MAY OCCUR IN THE PROCESS OF THIS TRANSACTION.
PLEASE, I NEED YOUR ENTIRE SUPPORT AND CO-OPERATION FOR THE SUCCESS OF THIS BUSINESS VENTURES, YOUR UTMOST CONFIDENTIALITY AND SECRECY IS HIGHLY REQUIRED, DUE TO MY FAMILY PRESENT PREDICAMENT.

I SINCERELY WILL APPRECIATE YOUR ACKNOWLEDGEMENT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. YOU CAN MAIL ME ON THIS E-MAIL:nzangamobutu@myself.com

Best regards,
MR. NZANGA MOBUTU.

Subject: Request for Support in Overseas Asset Transition and Partnership

Greetings,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am a relative of a former head of state from Central Africa. As you may be aware, my family is currently in a transitional situation involving financial matters with the new government administration, which has resulted in limited access to certain international systems.

Due to the current diplomatic environment and the evolving nature of our connections with institutions abroad, it has become increasingly difficult to manage our resources globally.

In light of this, I am reaching out for your assistance with overseeing a confidential arrangement involving a portion of family-held assets. These resources are currently safeguarded through a discreet financial service provider and can be allocated to a trusted associate upon authorization.

You would be listed as an external representative, assisting with subsequent planning and resource management. A proportional share of the asset value and any resulting opportunities will be extended to you as appreciation for your participation. Additional allocation is reserved for any necessary procedures involved.

I kindly ask for your consideration and assurance of confidentiality as we explore this opportunity together.

Please respond via this address if you are open to discussing this matter further: nzangamobutu@myself.com

Warm regards,
Nzanga M.
new_text_2:
Subject: Inquiry Regarding External Liaison for Account Transfer

Hello,

I am contacting you with respect to a matter involving financial operations linked to a private family portfolio. The context involves adjustments in administrative access following transitions within a central African nation’s leadership.

Due to ongoing realignment with external institutions, logistical constraints have impacted access to designated accounts. A portion of the portfolio remains with an independent intermediary entity and may be reassigned to an approved contact following standard verification procedures.

We are currently reviewing potential candidates for external liaison roles to support basic planning and oversight tasks related to this account. Should this be of interest, we would be prepared to outline a compensation structure proportional to any administrative involvement.

If this is something you would be willing to consider, please direct responses to: nzangamobutu@myself.com

We ask that communication regarding this inquiry remain confidential.

Sincerely,
N. M.
new_text_3:
Subject: Inquiry Notice: Liaison Candidate Review for Procedural Coordination

This notification concerns transitional procedural planning associated with designated holdings in a regional administrative framework.

Following realignment within certain governance structures, access mechanisms related to specific logistical channels are subject to temporary limitation. Portions of the overall framework remain under the oversight of an intermediary organization.

An external liaison is being considered for routine coordination roles. Responsibilities would relate to procedural alignment and operational tracking. All tasks are confined to documentation and compliance review within established structures.

For access to related documentation, contact:
📧 nzangamobutu@myself.com
(Please reference this notice.)

All correspondence is considered confidential and informational only.

— Coordination Review Unit

new_text_1:
Subject: Promotional Email Distribution Services — Inquiry Welcome

We provide cost-effective outreach solutions for high-volume email distribution.

Direct email campaigns can help you reach a wider audience by delivering your content directly to inboxes. Unlike search engines or traditional advertising channels, this form of outreach ensures proactive engagement with your target market. For budget-conscious campaigns, it’s among the most efficient solutions available.

Our team manages the distribution process end-to-end — all you need to provide is your content.

Services Offered:

Standard Distribution Plans (Volume-Based)
	•	Up to 250,000 recipients – $200
	•	Up to 500,000 recipients – $300
	•	Up to 1,000,000 recipients – $400

Extended Packages Available Upon Request

Our team currently has space to onboard one additional campaign partner.
Ongoing message delivery is available throughout the week, with estimated reach between 3 to 5 million contacts per day (depending on content format and volume).

Clients may experience a notable increase in lead generation and engagement.
Our 7-day full-access plan starts at $2,500/week. Unlike other services that may charge per million contacts, our structure includes extended coverage beyond the first tier at no extra cost.

Bonus: For agreements finalized within 48 hours, we’re including an additional 200,000 complimentary messages.

⸻

Interested in learning more? Let’s talk.
Call anytime: 308-650-5905

To unsubscribe from future notices:
mailto:trudymail2002@themail.com?Subject=nomore4me
new_text_2:
Subject: Volume Email Distribution Overview – General Information

Cost-effective outreach services are available for organizations seeking high-volume communication channels.

Targeted email distribution remains an efficient method for delivering information to a broad audience. Unlike passive advertising channels, this approach supports consistent, proactive message visibility. For budget-conscious outreach strategies, this method offers significant value.

Distribution processes are handled end-to-end. Content materials are accepted in standard format.

Available Distribution Packages (Tiered by Volume):
	•	Up to 250,000 records – $200
	•	Up to 500,000 records – $300
	•	Up to 1,000,000 records – $400

Additional tiers may be discussed upon inquiry.

Current onboarding availability allows for one new campaign allocation. Messaging cycles operate throughout the week, with estimated daily throughput ranging from 3 to 5 million data points, subject to file specifications.

Performance may result in elevated engagement and interest levels. A seven-day delivery cycle begins at $2,500, inclusive of expanded delivery beyond initial thresholds.

Early confirmation within 48 hours qualifies for a 200,000-message extension at no additional cost.

⸻

For clarification or additional details, please use the contact number provided:
308-650-5905

To discontinue future notifications:
mailto:trudymail2002@themail.com?Subject=nomore4me
new_text_3:
Subject: Communication Distribution Tiers – Service Overview

This outline provides technical details on tiered communication scheduling designed for organizations operating at scale.

The platform enables automated sequences for broad informational routing. Unlike passive awareness formats, structured scheduling supports consistent circulation patterns within planned distribution intervals. For operations requiring scheduled throughput, this method ensures measurable consistency.

All processing is managed in a closed system. Input templates are standardized.

Throughput Tiers (Per Cycle):
	•	Tier 1: up to 250,000 entries – $200
	•	Tier 2: up to 500,000 entries – $300
	•	Tier 3: up to 1,000,000 entries – $400

Customized configurations may be arranged upon request.

The system currently supports onboarding of one additional participant cycle. Typical routing operates 7 days per week, with daily metrics between 3–5 million units depending on input format.

Baseline usage for full-week cycles begins at $2,500, inclusive of resources exceeding the top tier.

Bonus provision: Confirmed entry within 48 hours enables extension of an additional 200,000 routed units at no charge.

⸻

For additional procedural specifications, contact:
📞 308-650-5905

To opt out of notifications:
mailto:trudymail2002@themail.com?Subject=nomore4me

original_text:
Ms. Anita Obadan
Tenders Board,
Indepedent National electoral Commission
Lagos, Nigeria.

Dear Friend,

I guess this letter may come to you as surprise since I had no previous correspondence with you.

I am the Secretary, tenders board of independent national Electoral commission (INEC). I got your contact in  my Search for a reliable person handle a very confidential Transaction involving the transfer of US$16.5 million.

The above fund is not connected with arms, drugs or Money laundering. It is the product of an over invoiced Contract awarded in 2001 by INEC to a foreign company for the construction of high rise estate in the federal capital territory.

The contract has long been executed and payment of The actual contract amount has been paid to the Foreign contractor leaving the balance, which my colleagues and I now want to transfer out of Nigeria into a reliable foreign account for our personal use.
As civil servants we are not allowed to run foreign accounts. Hence we have chosen to front and support you as the Beneficiary to be paid.

If you are interested in the proposal contact the Chairman of the board Dr. Akinade Williams on: akinwills@netzero.com;  with the subject: (ANITA'S CONTACT) with your letter of acceptance along with your Direct telephone and fax numbers.If you use this subject, he will know that you are responding to the proposal that I sent to you.
 we have decided to share The money in the following percentage, 60% for us 30% for you The account owner and 10% for all local and international Expenses that may arise in the course of this transaction.

Further details about this transaction will be discussed in the subsequent correspondence.

Note also that the particular nature of Your business is irrelevant to this transaction and  all local contacts and arrangements are in place For a smooth and successful conclusion of this transaction.

Be informed that we are aware of the way email proposals of this type are being sent from this part of africa and as regards that,you should please treat this with utmost attention knowing fully well that you cannot and will not be compelled to assist us if you are not disposed to.

Contact me, or the Chairman via email with your contact telephone and fax Numbers, so that he can call you for a discussion.

Thank you as i await your response.

Sincerely,

Ms. Anita Obadan

new_text_1:
Ms. Anita Obadan
Administrative Board
Independent National Electoral Commission
Lagos, Nigeria

Hello,

I hope this message reaches you well, although we’ve not been in prior contact.

I am currently working with the administrative division of Nigeria’s electoral body (INEC). Your contact was found during a search for a dependable individual who may assist with a confidential matter involving the management of external funds totaling approximately $16.5 million.

This amount is completely unrelated to any prohibited activities. It originates from a government contract issued in 2001 to a foreign construction firm, which has since completed its assigned work within the capital region.

Following full payment of the principal contract amount, an excess balance remains, which my associates and I are seeking to relocate for private purposes. Due to our official roles, we are not permitted to maintain external financial accounts. We are therefore looking to establish you as a designated recipient for this process.

If this is something you’d be open to assisting with, please contact Dr. Akinade Williams at: akinwills@netzero.com using the subject line: (Referral from Anita), and kindly include your written agreement as well as your contact number.

We are prepared to divide the funds as follows:
	•	60% retained by us
	•	30% designated for your support
	•	10% reserved for any logistical and coordination-related requirements

Further coordination and full procedural clarity will follow in subsequent messages.

The nature of your existing professional activity is not a concern here — our internal preparations ensure that everything can proceed with stability.

We recognize the existence of similar messages originating from this region and the skepticism that may arise. However, we assure you of the integrity of our intent. If you are not inclined to be involved, we understand fully and thank you for your time.

Feel free to reply with your preferred contact information should you wish to explore this further.

Warm regards,
Anita Obadan

Subject: Request for External Liaison — Contract Finalization Process

Greetings,

This message concerns a procedural matter relating to the closeout of a completed infrastructure agreement initiated in 2001. The project, contracted to an international vendor, concluded with all deliverables fulfilled in accordance with initial terms.

Upon final reconciliation of payment schedules, a surplus amount was identified. Regulatory constraints applicable to public officials have restricted internal handling of said surplus.

Accordingly, an external contact is being reviewed for the purposes of formalizing a non-local handover. The intended recipient would serve as a third-party coordinator for administrative consolidation.

Correspondence regarding this matter may be directed to:
A. Williams at akinwills@netzero.com
Subject line: Reference: A. Obadan Referral
Kindly include a contact reference for return communication.

A provisional allocation plan has been drafted:
	•	60% internal retention
	•	30% for service coordination
	•	10% assigned to incidental requirements

All activity is subject to further instruction and process compliance measures.

This message is intended solely for informative purposes. If participation is not desired, no further action is necessary.

Sincerely,
A. Obadan

I'm happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds transferred under the co-operation of a new partner from Venezuala.Presently i'm in Japan for investment projects with my own share of the total sum.meanwhile,i didn't forget your past efforts and attempts to assist me in transffering those funds despite that it failed us some how.
 
Now contact my secretary  his name is Mr.Elton Alagod,his email:( eltonalagod@myway.com ) ask him to send you the total $800,000.00 bank draft which i raised in your favour for your compensation for all the past efforts and attempts to assist me in this matter.i appreciated your efforts at that time very much.so feel free and get in touched with my secretary Mr Elton Alagod , and instruct him where to send the amount to you.

My regards to you and your family,
Barris George

I’m pleased to let you know that arrangements related to a prior financial process have been concluded successfully through the support of a new associate from Venezuela. I’m currently in Japan, focusing on future ventures and personal planning.

Though things didn’t work out the way we hoped in the past, I still truly value the effort you extended to help move things forward at that time.

Name: Elton Alagod
Email: eltonalagod@myway.com

He has a certified document prepared in your name, which reflects the acknowledgement of your involvement. Kindly reach out and let him know how best to direct it to you.

Thank you again for your earlier support. I hope this finds you and your family well.

Warm wishes,
Barris George

ATTENTION.  Hello Sir,  I am  PRINCE OGO,a member of the Movement For Democratic Change in  Zimbabwe...my party is opposed to the Zanu-PF party of the incumbent  President Robert Mugabe.I went into a partnership with a white farmer  and a buisness man in Zimbabwe and as we progressed in buisness,i  bought  his ideas and philosophy which made me join the movement for  democratic  change which is dominated by the whites(of which my colleague is a top  member).   We control a greater portion of the white-dominated farms in Zimbabwe  and we are major shareholders in major companies in Zimbabwe.The Mugabe  government and his political associates are not tolerant with the  activities of the movement for demcratic change and he is using  indirect  guerilla war tactic to oppress the members.   Zimbabwe war veterans invaded our farm and confiscated some of our  assets and held us hostage.I managed to escape from their brutality but  my buisness partner die!
 d on the struggle.He left message that i should  sell off all our assets including the farms,estates and the companies  ensuring that his family relocates oversea and also to invest the money  propperly bearing in mined that the next step of the guerillas will be  to confiscate those remaining assets.   I have successfully sold off the remaining portion of our estate ,  companies and farms after which i managed with the help of the  immigration to sneak out of zimbabwe with my partner's family to  Dubai,so  right now we are in Dubai(UAE).The total sum in our possession at this  moment is US$18.5M(eighteen million and five hundred thousand dollers)  realised from the aution sales of the estate,farms and companies.  I got to know you from an internet database and from my careful  analysis  i realized that you could assist in this venture.All i want u to do is  to  assist us to relocate the money through your account in your  country  and also help !
 us to invest it properly in a good buisness when we get  to yo!
 ur count
ry.   I have two options for you,the first is that you could choose to have a  certain agreeable percentage of the money for nominating ur account for  this transaction,the other is you could as well go into a joint  buisness  partnership with me for proper investment of the fund in your contry.  Which ever way you want it,feel free to notify me.I have also mapped  out  %5 of the money for all kinds of expenses incured in the process of  the  transaction and if you dont prefer joint partnership,i am offering you  %20 of the fund while the rest %75 will be for my investment.   Please i need your reply urgently to let me know if you are capable to  assist me and if you are comfortable with my offer so that we can  proceed.                       Regards..                    PRINCE OGO

new_text_1:
Subject: Request for Support with Relocation of Resources

Greetings,

I hope this finds you well. I am reaching out regarding a situation connected to business developments in Zimbabwe.

I was previously involved in a partnership within the agricultural and commercial sector alongside a close associate, during which we established a number of operations in the region. Due to changing circumstances and political shifts, several of our interests were impacted.

Following serious unrest, our ventures faced escalating challenges. With assistance, I was able to leave the country and ensure the safe relocation of my associate’s family. Unfortunately, he did not survive the events that unfolded.

In alignment with his intentions, I took steps to close out our holdings, including property and company assets. The returns from these actions are currently held securely with us in Dubai. The total value of this portfolio is estimated at approximately $18.5 million USD.

In reviewing trusted contacts from an international business platform, I came across your information. I believe there may be an opportunity to partner with someone externally who can facilitate the structured transition and future application of these resources.

There are two ways we might collaborate:
	•	You may support by serving as a financial contact and would receive a percentage of the available funds.
	•	Alternatively, you could explore a joint venture with us, and we could work together to develop a business in your region.

A separate allocation has been designated to cover all steps necessary in the handling of this matter.

Please share your interest and preferred approach, and I will be happy to continue this conversation.

Sincerely,
Ogo
new_text_2:
Subject: External Liaison Inquiry for Project Finalization

This message refers to the completion of a series of commercial projects previously operated in a Southern African jurisdiction.

A former business associate had maintained multiple holdings in the agricultural and logistics sectors. Following developments in the regional political landscape, it became necessary to initiate closure and reallocation procedures for those interests.

Assets were divested, and proceeds are now secured in a holding structure outside the region. The total amount currently under management is valued at approximately $18.5 million USD.

A review of available channels led to this point of contact. The objective is to identify an external liaison for procedural coordination regarding the next phase of repositioning and resource management.

Engagement may proceed along one of two models:
	•	A contact entity may be nominated to support disbursement logistics, with corresponding administrative value transferred;
	•	Alternatively, a collaborative enterprise may be considered under mutual terms.

Allocated resources are reserved for all formal requirements, including facilitation and compliance.

If further information is needed to evaluate potential participation, please indicate availability for follow-up.

Respectfully,
O. G.

FROM SAMUEL & BEKIJA  ZUMA       COTE D IVOIRE
WEST AFRICA

DEAR FRIEND,

PERMIT US TO INFORM YOU OF OUR DESIRE OF ENTERING INTO BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP WITH YOU, WE GOT YOUR CONTACT THROUGH A FRIEND WHO WORKS IN THE HUMAN RIGHTS COMMISSION HERE IN ABIDJAN COTE D IVOIRE, I PRAYED OVER IT AND SELECTED YOU  AMOUNG OTHER PEOPLE DUE TO SESTEMING NATURE AND THE RECOMMENDATIONS GIVEN TO ME AS A REPUTABLE AND TRUSTWORTHY PERSON WE CAN DO BUSINESS WITH AND BY THEIR RECOMMENDATIONS WE MUST NOT HESITATE CONFIDE IN YOU FOR THIS SIMPLE AND SINCERE BUSINESS.

I AM BEKIJA ZUMA AND YOUNGER BROTHER SAMUEL ZUMA,THE ONLY CHILDREN OF LATE MR CHIEF HENNRY ZUMA , OUR FAHTER WAS A VERY WEALTHY COCOA  MERCHANT BASED IN ABIDJAN THE ECONOMIC CAPITAL OF IVORY COAST BEFORE HE WAS POISONED TO DEATH BY HIS BUSINESS ASSOCIATES ON ONE OF THEIR OUTING TO DISCUSS ON A BUSINESS DEAL. WHEN OUR MOTHER DIED ON 1ST OCTOBER 1999.

OUR FATHER TOOK US SO SPECIAL BECAUSE WE ARE MOTHERLESS. BEFORE THE DEATH
OF OUR FATHER ON 29TH AUGUST 2004 IN A PRIVATE HOSPITAL HERE IN ABIDJAN.
HE SECRETLY CALLED ME ON HIS BEDSIDE AND TOLD ME THAT HE HAS A SUM OF US$12.500.000.00 (TWELVE MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND, UNITED STATES DOLLARS) LEFT IN ONE OF THE
LOCAL BANKS HERE IN ABIDJAN. THAT HE USED MY NAME AS HIS BELOVED DUAGHTER FOR THE NEXT OF KIN IN DEPOSIT OF THE FUND.

HE ALSO EXPLAINED TO US THAT IT WAS BECAUSE OF THIS WEALTH THAT HE WAS POISONED
BY HIS BUSINESS ASSOCIATES, THAT I SHOULD SEEK FOR A FOREIGN PARTNER IN
A COUNTRY OF OUR CHOICE WHERE I WILL TRANSFER THIS MONEY AND USE IT FOR
INVESTMENT PURPOSE. (SUCH AS REAL ESTATE MANAGEMENT). I AM HONOURABLY SEEKING YOUR ASSISTANCE IN THE FOLLOWING WAYS .

TO PROVIDE A BANK ACCOUNT WHERE THIS MONEY WOULD BE TRANSFERED TO SERVE AS THE GUARDIAN OF THIS FUND SINCE I AM A GIRL OF 22 YEARS TO MAKE ARRANGEMENT FOR US TO COME OVER TO YOUR COUNTRY TO FURTHER OUR EDUCATION AND TO SECURE A RESIDENTIAL PERMIT IN YOUR COUNTRY.

WE ARE WILLING TO OFFER YOU 20% OF THE TOTAL SUM AS COMPENSATION FOR YOUR EFFORT INPUT AFTER THE SUCCESSFUL TRANSFER OF THIS FUND TO YOUR NOMINATED ACCOUNT OVERSEAS. FURTHERMORE, YOU CAN INDICATE YOUR OPTION TOWARDS ASSISTING US AS WE BELIEVE THAT THIS TRANSACTION WOULD BE CONCLUDED WITHIN SEVEN (7) DAYS YOU SIGNIFY INTEREST TO ASSIST US. WE WILL APPRECIATE YOU SEND US E-MAIL. samuel_bekija92005@yahoo.es

ANTICIPATING TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON.

THANKS AND GOD BLESS.
SAMUEL AND BEKIJA ZUMA










		
---------------------------------

LLama Gratis a cualquier PC del Mundo.
Llamadas a fijos y moviles desde 1 centimo por minuto.
http://es.voice.yahoo.com

From: Samuel & Bekija Zuma
Location: Côte d’Ivoire, West Africa

Subject: Proposal for Business Support and Educational Opportunity

Hello,

We hope this message reaches you well. We’re writing to explore the possibility of a professional collaboration.

We are Samuel and Bekija Zuma, siblings and children of the late Chief Henry Zuma — a successful cocoa trader formerly operating in Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire’s commercial capital. Following unfortunate events involving our father’s former business circle, we’ve faced significant changes and challenges.

Before his passing in 2004, our father entrusted us with information about financial holdings — specifically, a deposit of approximately $12.5 million USD made in a secure account under our family name. We were advised to seek international guidance in identifying a safe location where this resource could be transferred for investment purposes. One area of focus we hope to pursue is real estate development and educational advancement.

We are reaching out to you with the hope that you might be open to supporting this process by:
	•	Facilitating the secure transition of the funds to a financial account in your region.
	•	Advising or participating in responsible investment opportunities.
	•	Assisting us in arrangements for residency and continued learning abroad.

Should you be open to a supportive role in this process, we are prepared to allocate a portion of the total amount in recognition of your contribution. We believe that, with the right structure, this can be resolved efficiently and transparently.

If this is of interest, you may reach us at: samuel_bekija92005@yahoo.es

We’re grateful for your time and consideration.

Warm regards,
Samuel and Bekija Zuma

As part of succession procedures, a final stage in the reallocation of liquid assets is being scheduled. The estate in question involved historical engagement in agricultural export markets and includes holdings presently situated with a private custodian entity.

To proceed, external coordination is being sought to identify a potential liaison for formal account reception and planning. Involvement would include participation in routine facilitation and advisory activities related to reinvestment and relocation logistics.

Arrangements include:
	•	Reserved value for administrative services rendered
	•	Optional participation in structured commercial planning
	•	Follow-up on residency processes in coordination with legal counsel

Additional information can be provided upon indication of availability for correspondence. Communications should be directed to:

Sincerely,
Coordination Office – S. & B. Zuma

original_text:
>From The Desk of Mr. Gary Fredricks
Head of Foreign Operations 
5, mall London Road, 
Swanley Kent BR8 7WL
London EC2R 8BP,
United Kingdom.
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX 44-7005-921-605
E-mail: mrgary_fredricks@yahoo.de

Dear Partner,

Do accept my sincere apologies if my mail does not meet your personal ethics.  For i know this may seem like a complete intrusion to your privacy but right about now this is my option of communication. This note might seem strange or probably untrue considering the amount of junk mails we receive daily, but i believe this is still the most genuine way of contacting a true character. 

I will introduce myself as the Head of Foreign Operations Department in the accounts management section this well-known bank here in the United Kingdom as Stated above. I am seeking your cooperation to present you to my bank as the Next of kin to LATE ANDREA SCHRANNER. A Germany property Magnate Andreas Schranner, 64, his wife Maria, 62, their daughter Andrea Eich, 38, her husband Christian, 57, and their children Katharina, eight, and Maximilian, 10, all perished in the jet.

Please click here below for verification. 

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm
 
PROPOSITION:
One of late Andrea Schranner's accounts with holding balance of 15,000,000(Fifteen Million British Pounds) has been dormant and has not been operated for the past 5 years and the DEPOSIT will be converted to UNCLAIMED  DEPOSIT and therefore forfeited if nobody comes forward to lay claim to the deposit before the end of this financial quarter, as is the practice and also indicated in the EU banking guidelines.
 
>From my investigations and confirmation, the owner of this account a foreigner by name Late Andrea Schranner's died on MONDAY, 31 JULY,2000 in a plane crash with his family.

After going through the deceased records and files, I discovered that: 
(1) No one has operated this account since 2000;
(2) He died without a heir; hence the money has been floating. 
(3) No other person knows about this account and there was no known beneficiary. 

And if we do not remit this money urgently, it would be confiscated and forfeited for nothing. I have secretly discussed this matter with account officer and we have agreed to find a reliable foreign partner to deal with. We thus propose to do business with you, standing in as the next of kin of these funds from the deceased and funds released to you after due processes have been followed. 
 
This transaction is totally free of risk and troubles as the fund is a legitimate and does not originate from drug, money laundering, terrorism or any other illegal act. On your interest, let me hear from you.


On your interest, let me have your private/direct contact numbers including fax and a copy of your International Passport or driver's license for easy communication, identification and trust. I must be reached only on my private contact details for confidential reasons.


 
Regards,
Mr. Gary Fredricks
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX 44-7005-921-605

new_text_1:
From The Desk of Mr. Gary Fredricks
Head of Foreign Operations
5, mall London Road,
Swanley Kent BR8 7WL
London EC2R 8BP,
United Kingdom
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX: +44-7005-921-605
E-mail: mrgary_fredricks@yahoo.de

⸻

Dear Partner,

Please accept my apologies if this message seems unexpected or unfamiliar. I realize this may come across as a disruption to your privacy, but at present, this is the most appropriate channel to reach out. While you may be cautious due to the volume of unsolicited emails received daily, I believe this remains a sincere method of connecting with someone of genuine integrity.

I am the Head of Foreign Operations within the oversight division at a reputable financial institution here in the United Kingdom. I am seeking your cooperation to represent you as a related party to the late Andrea Schranner.

A German entrepreneur, Mr. Schranner, and his family passed away in a tragic aviation incident.
Please refer to the following link for context:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm

⸻

Details:
One of Mr. Schranner’s inactive financial holdings, amounting to £15,000,000 (Fifteen Million British Pounds), has not been accessed for over five years. According to standard policy and EU financial guidelines, if no claim is submitted by the close of this financial cycle, it may be redirected to institutional reserves.

Based on internal reviews:
	1.	No access to the account has occurred since 2000.
	2.	Mr. Schranner passed away without recorded successors.
	3.	No other individuals are connected to this balance.

Unless this situation is addressed soon, the funds may be reallocated permanently. After discreet discussions, we resolved to identify a trustworthy external associate to assist in presenting this claim, allowing formal authorization and release of the funds following required procedures.

This initiative is in line with compliance standards and bears no connection to any unlawful activities. Should this interest you, please respond accordingly.

If you wish to move forward, kindly provide your private contact details including a fax number and a form of identification such as a government-issued license, to ensure secure communication. Please use the contact information above for all correspondence.

⸻

Sincerely,
Mr. Gary Fredricks
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX: +44-7005-921-605
new_text_2:
From the Office of Mr. Gary Fredricks
Foreign Division
5 Mall London Road
Swanley Kent BR8 7WL
London EC2R 8BP
United Kingdom
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX: +44-7005-921-605
E-mail: mrgary_fredricks@yahoo.de

⸻

To Whom It May Concern,

I hope this message reaches you well. I understand it may be unexpected, but given the circumstances, this is the best method I have available to initiate contact. Although unsolicited messages are common, I trust this will be received in good faith.

I am part of the Foreign Division at a recognized institution in the United Kingdom. I would like to discuss a matter involving the estate of Andrea Schranner.

Mr. Schranner, a German national, along with his family, tragically lost their lives in an air accident.
You can find more background here:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm

⸻

Information:
One of Mr. Schranner’s accounts, inactive for over five years, contains a significant balance — £15 million (Fifteen Million GBP). Per routine financial procedures and European regulatory standards, balances not claimed within a defined timeframe may be redirected internally.

Our internal evaluation found:
	1.	The account has remained unused since 2000.
	2.	No records of direct successors were identified.
	3.	No listed beneficiaries exist.

We are therefore looking to collaborate with a reliable contact who may assist in this matter through the appropriate channels.

This process is in full alignment with established legal and regulatory frameworks. If you are interested, feel free to reach out using the contact information listed above.

To continue, please share your preferred contact information and a form of identification for verification and further coordination.

⸻

Warm regards,
Gary Fredricks
TEL: +44-704-0185-556
FAX: +44-7005-921-605
new_text_3:
Correspondence from Gary Fredricks
International Liaison Division
5 Mall London Road
Swanley Kent BR8 7WL
London EC2R 8BP
United Kingdom
Phone: +44-704-0185-556
Fax: +44-7005-921-605
Email: mrgary_fredricks@yahoo.de

⸻

Greetings,

I hope this note finds you well. Though the message may come unexpectedly, this is currently the most effective way to initiate correspondence. Given the volume of digital communications we all receive, I appreciate your time and consideration.

I represent the International Liaison Division at a recognized institution in the United Kingdom. I am reaching out concerning historical records related to Andrea Schranner.

Mr. Schranner, a German citizen, along with members of his family, passed away in a well-documented air incident.
You may refer to the following public report for reference:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm

⸻

Summary:
A financial record attributed to Mr. Schranner has remained dormant for more than five years. According to general regulatory guidelines, assets not associated with active documentation may be reallocated through internal administrative processes.

Following our review:
	1.	The record has not been updated since 2000.
	2.	No successor information is available.
	3.	No affiliations have been documented.

We are seeking a qualified individual to assist with the archival and administrative resolution of this file, in line with formal review processes.

This inquiry conforms to standard practices under applicable regulations. If you wish to engage, please get in touch via the contact information provided.

If so, kindly forward your preferred method of contact and a supporting identification document to facilitate confirmation and next steps.

⸻

Kind regards,
Gary Fredricks
Phone: +44-704-0185-556
Fax: +44-7005-921-605
